|brand = TP-LINK |model = Archer C6 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v2.x |subrevision = (US) |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 12/05/2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/TP-LINK_Archer_C6_v2.x |wlclass = AC1200 |series = Archer C6 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7A6 |icid = 8853A-A6 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 1806012A6-2.0 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9563; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 775 <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD25Q64CSIG; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Zentel;A3R1GE40JBF; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337N; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 98:DA:C4 |oui = 98:DA:C4
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = no |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = TP-Link_XXXX, TP-Link_XXXX_5G |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Proware |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = US |fccapprovdate = 12/04/2018 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07L5YRYF4 |asin_country = GB |asin2 = B07GVR9TG7 |asin_country2 = GB |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9886; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Web GUI: http://tplinkwifi.net
"1806012A6-2.0 Rev1.0sp2" is silkscreened :on the board in the FCC photos.
The [[TP-LINK Archer A6 v2.x]] is likely identical.
{{See also|TP-LINK Archer C series|Proware|ath79}}
===Hardware specification=== * SOC: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9563 @775 MHz * Flash: ''GigaDevice'' GD25Q64CSIG (8MiB SPI) * RAM: ''Zentel'' A3R1GE40JBF (128MiB DDR2) * Wireless: AC1200 802.11abgn/ac (2.4/5 GHz) : 2.4GHz (802.11bgn) [[QCA]] QCA9563 int. (3x3) : 5GHz (802.11an/ac) [[QCA]] QCA9886 (2x2) * Ethernet: 1x 1GbE WAN, 4x 1GbE LAN : Switch: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337N * LED: Power, WLAN 2G, WLAN 5G, LAN, WAN, WPS * UART: There's no UART header on the board * Button: Power, Reset, WPS
==Links of Interest== *[https://github.com/openwrt/openwrt/commit/d03aae1a09fce5a5d5747855bc07ee1f54388e03 ath79: OpenWrt add support for TP-LINK Archer C6 v2 (EU)]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_archer_c6_v2_us |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/archer_c6_v2 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ath79 |subtarget = generic |arch = mips_24kc |support_started_version = 21.02.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.2 |comment = (US) }}
